title: Constant crashing - Black screen on load.
body:
So now I get leaverbuster because this joke of a game crashes constantly and I can't load in until the 7/8 minute mark. Never had a problem like this in the past but in the days since the patch this has happened several times. 

5.14 has literally been the most buggy patch I have ever played since season 3. Is there any way to have the punishment removed? I am not going afk in games. Not only did this cost me getting promoted to silver but now bugs like this are making me wait before games. 

I am seriously insulted that Riot think it is okay to make me sit in time out for 25 minutes like a child because **their** service is flawed.

replies.body: I've been getting this intermittently as well. I've re-installed 3 times now and each time I play a couple games, then get black screened. I have low-prio for 7 games now, as the most I can ever seem to reconnect for is 3 games then it just drops me and I can't reconnect. I've tried multiple forums to fix it, along with updating all drivers, but nothing helps. Please for the glory of Teemo fix this.
Bump - Nearly a week with no response. Poor form Riot. This is a persistent issue and is really important.

Should be in a ranked game but keep getting this same dc error. Restarted the client now I can't log in. Seeing this. http://i.imgur.com/92LDedW.png

Able to help me at all? I just reinstalled the other day because of the shop bug. This is costing me so many ranked games now. It's really annoying.

Edit: Just want to add that I went through the help article linked in the screenshot. Everything was already set correctly and my internet is working perfectly fine in every other application. This is definitely a league bug and I am being punished for it.


Edit 2: This is the message I get when the load screen disconnects. http://i.imgur.com/RNWAV19.png

Edit 3: Just did a speedtest to show its not my internet http://i.imgur.com/0ub436f.png Also want to note that if I actually eventually get into a game I don't have any connection issues.

Edit 4: Finally connected to my ranked game at the 30 minute mark..... we actually managed to pull out a win anyway but I got another 5 games leaverbuster... now with 10 minute wait. This is actually complete bs. Totally unacceptable.
